name: Zombees
description:
Zombees is a single player first person shooter that was made entirely with using Unreal Engine 4's starter content. This game was made by me during what I like to call a sub-24 hr game jam. It's my first full game I have ever put up for others to play so I do hope you will enjoy it. Don't forget to use your flash light and peek around every corner!

Feel free to leave comments about the game as well!
